name: AutoReply | AI Smart Message
description: Send AI-generated or custom replies instantly on WhatsApp, Instagram & Facebook. Automate your messaging with intelligent responses powered by cutting-edge AI technology.

name: MultiGPT | AI Chat & Compare
description: Chat with multiple AI models simultaneously and compare their responses. Perfect for getting diverse perspectives on any topic.

name: SplitX
description: Split expenses effortlessly with friends, family, or roommates. Track shared costs and settle debts with ease.

name: QR & Barcode | Offline Scan
description: Fast, reliable QR and barcode scanning that works completely offline. No internet required for scanning.

name: Drawing Board | Brush, Shapes
description: Express your creativity with brushes, shapes, and colors. A simple yet powerful drawing app for all ages.

name: Random Quotes & Design Studio
description: Discover inspiring quotes and create beautiful designs. Share wisdom and motivation with your friends.
